history.proof: hauto use: is_series_unique, is_pseries_R unfold: PSeries.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of is_pseries_R (is_pseries _ _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment a : nat -> R x, l : R H : Series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) = l Unable to unify "Series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) = l" with "PSeries a x = l".

original: intros a l x H. unfold is_pseries, PSeries in H. rewrite is_pseries_R in H. apply is_series_unique in H. apply H.
